ModMetaData.name: Slow Down
ModMetaData.author: lost_RD
ModMetaData.description:
Inverts the fast forward options so they slow down the game instead. Useful for achieving a constant video framerate when the game is under heavy stress, or for slowing down combat if you'd prefer not to pause.
To enable or disable slow mode, use the keybind (defaults to the 5 button). See the mod settings menu to disable the keybind or to enable Hardcore Mode. You'll know when slow mode is enabled because the GUI buttons go red.
Hardcore Mode: pausing is disabled! The pause button now cycles between the three (slow) speeds and you can even disable the slower speeds if you want.
Latest update: Hardcore (no-pause) mode added, speed buttons are red when slow mode is enabled.
